rules:
    request-forbidden-headers:
        description: OAS do not allow using the following HTTP headers in a specification file Authorization, Content-Type and Accept. You MUST use the associate functionalities provided by OAS, instead.
            :
        message: {{error}} in {{path}} {{value}}
        severity: error
            function: pattern
                notMatch: /^(accept|content-type|authorization)$/i
            :
